summary.span: 命名空间包含由 Visual Studio 中不同种类的 Office 项目使用的类型。

span.span: The namespace contains types that are used by different kinds of Office projects in Visual Studio.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 命名空间包括以下主要类型：The namespace includes the following main types: - 类。The class. 这是类的基类`ThisAddIn`应用程序级外接程序项目中的类。This is the base class for the `ThisAddIn` class in application-level add-in projects. 有关详细信息，请参阅[Programming VSTO Add-ins](/visualstudio/vsto/programming-vsto-add-ins)。For more information, see [Programming VSTO Add-Ins](/visualstudio/vsto/programming-vsto-add-ins). - 用于创建自定义任务窗格应用程序级加载项中，包括类型和。Types for creating custom task panes in application-level add-ins, including and . 有关详细信息，请参阅[自定义任务窗格](/visualstudio/vsto/custom-task-panes)。For more information, see [Custom Task Panes](/visualstudio/vsto/custom-task-panes). - 用于在文档级自定义项，包括创建操作窗格的类型和。Types for creating actions panes in document-level customizations, including and . 有关详细信息，请参阅[操作窗格概述](/visualstudio/vsto/actions-pane-overview)。For more information, see [Actions Pane Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/actions-pane-overview). - 类型用于创建智能标记，如， ，和。Types for creating smart tags, such as , , and . 有关详细信息，请参阅[智能标记概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f89678b8-4514-4d12-ad52-731555417d11)。For more information, see [Smart Tags Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f89678b8-4514-4d12-ad52-731555417d11).
